TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebProxy extends System.Object implements class System.Net.IWebProxy, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type WebProxy = class interface ISerializable interface IWebProxy

summary.span: 包含 类的 HTTP 代理设置。

span.span: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含代理设置, 这些设置用于确定是否使用 Web 代理来发送请求。 The class contains the proxy settings that instances use to determine whether a Web proxy is used to send requests. 全局 Web 代理设置可在计算机和应用程序配置文件中指定, 应用程序可以使用类的实例来自定义 Web 代理使用。Global Web proxy settings can be specified in machine and application configuration files, and applications can use instances of the class to customize Web proxy use. 类是接口的基实现。 The class is the base implementation of the interface. 若要获取 Web 代理类的实例, 可以使用以下任一方法:To obtain instances of the Web proxy class, you can use any of the following methods: - 构造函数。The constructor. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. 这些方法都提供一个可进一步自定义的实例; 它们之间的区别在于实例在返回到应用程序之前如何初始化。These methods each supply a instance that you can further customize; the difference between them is how the instance is initialized before it is returned to your application. 构造函数返回类的实例, 其属性设置为`null`。 The constructor returns an instance of the class with the property set to `null`. 当请求使用处于此状态的实例时, 将不使用代理来发送请求。When a request uses a instance in this state, no proxy is used to send the request. 方法返回类的实例,并将、和属性设置为InternetExplorer5.5和更高版本使用的值。 The method returns an instance of the class with the , , and properties set to the values used by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later. 方法返回类的实例, 并根据 Internet Explorer 和配置文件设置的组合设置其属性。 The method returns an instance of the class with it properties set according to a combination of Internet Explorer and configuration file settings. 类支持自动检测和执行代理配置脚本。The class supports automatic detection and execution of proxy configuration scripts. 此功能也称为 Web 代理自动发现 (WPAD)。This feature is also known as Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD). 使用自动代理配置时, 必须找到、下载、编译和运行配置脚本 (通常名为 Wpad)。When using automatic proxy configuration, a configuration script, typically named Wpad.dat, must be located, downloaded, compiled, and run. 如果这些操作成功, 该脚本将返回可用于请求的代理。If these operations are successful, the script returns the proxies that can be used for a request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将实例分配给实例。The following code example assigns a instance to a instance. 实例使用代理连接到外部 Internet 资源。The instance uses the proxy to connect to external Internet resources. (有关演示如何使用 WPAD 功能的示例, 请参阅类的文档。)(For an example that demonstrates using the WPAD feature, see the documentation for the class.) [!code-cpp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebProxy Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebProxy Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置代理服务器的地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the address of the proxy server.

value.span: 一个 实例，它包含代理服务器的地址。

span.span: A instance that contains the address of the proxy server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含代理服务器的地址。The property contains the address of the proxy server. 当未启用自动代理检测且未指定自动配置脚本时, 属性和确定用于请求的代理。When automatic proxy detection is not enabled, and no automatic configuration script is specified, the property and determine the proxy used for a request. 当属性为`null`时, 请求将绕过代理并直接连接到目标主机。 When the property is `null`, requests bypass the proxy and connect directly to the destination host. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示对象的属性, 包括其。 The following code example displays the properties of a object, including its . [!code-cpp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CPP/proxy.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLAutoProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CS/proxy.cs#1)]

span.span: to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的设置确定在访问本地 Internet 资源时实例是否使用代理服务器。The setting of the property determines whether instances use the proxy server when accessing local Internet resources. 如果 为 `true`，则对本地 Internet 资源的请求不使用代理服务器。If is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server. 本地请求通过 URI 中缺少句点 (.) 来`http://webserver/`标识, 如中所示, 或访问本地服务器, 包括`http://localhost`、 `http://loopback`或`http://127.0.0.1`。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in `http://webserver/`, or access the local server, including `http://localhost`, `http://loopback`, or `http://127.0.0.1`. 为 `false` 时，所有 Internet 请求都通过代理服务器进行。When is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server. > [!NOTE] > 对包含句点的 URI 的本地主机的请求使用代理。Requests to a local host with a URI that contain a period use the proxy. 若要避免在这些情况下使用代理, 请在中为主机创建一个条目。To avoid using a proxy in these cases, create an entry for the host in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用设置此属性和获取此属性的值的构造函数。The following code example demonstrates calling a constructor that sets this property and getting the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要提交到代理服务器进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

value.span: 一个 实例，它包含要提交给代理服务器进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: An instance that contains the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于响应 HTTP 407 (代理授权) 状态代码而发送到代理服务器的身份验证凭据。The property contains the authentication credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code. 在大多数客户端方案中, 应使用, 这是当前已登录用户的凭据。In most client scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 为此, 请将属性设置为`true` , 而不是设置此属性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. > [!NOTE] > 如果将属性设置为的凭据不是, 则将属性设置为`true`将导致。If you set the property to credentials other than the , setting the property to `true` causes a . 若要防止出现这种情况, 必须在`null`将属性设置为`true`之前将属性设置为。To prevent this, you must set the property to `null` before setting the property to `true`. 同样, 如果为`true`, 则不能将此属性设置为任意值。Likewise, you cannot set this property to any value when is `true`.

exception.span: 将 属性设置为 后，尝试设置此属性。

span.span: You attempted to set this property when the property was set to .

summary.span: 读取 Internet Explorer 非动态代理设置。

span.span: Reads the Internet Explorer nondynamic proxy settings.

returns.span: 一个 实例，它包含 Internet Explorer 5.5 及更高版本中的非动态代理设置。

span.span: A instance that contains the nondynamic proxy settings from Internet Explorer 5.5 and later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法读取 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本存储的非动态代理设置, 并使用这些设置创建一个实例。 The method reads the nondynamic proxy settings stored by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later, and creates a instance with those settings. 方法不会从 Internet Explorer 运行的脚本、自动配置条目或从 DHCP 或 DNS 查找中提取任何动态设置。The method does not pick up any dynamic settings that are generated from scripts run by Internet Explorer, from automatic configuration entries, or from DHCP or DNS lookups. 应用程序应使用属性和方法, 而不是方法。Applications should use the property and the method instead of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回实例用于访问 Internet 资源的 URI。 The method returns the URI that the instance uses to access the Internet resource. 使用`destination` 方法与的内容进行比较。 compares `destination` with the contents of , using the method. 如果 返回`true`, 则返回`destination` ,并且该实例不使用代理服务器。If returns `true`, returns `destination` and the instance does not use the proxy server. 如果`destination`不在中, 则实例使用代理服务器并返回属性。If `destination` is not in , the instance uses the proxy server and the property is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个对象并调用此方法来获取为资源选择的代理。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to get the proxy that is selected for a resource. [!code-cpp[NCLAutoProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CPP/proxy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLAutoProxy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAutoProxy/CS/proxy.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定在访问 Internet 资源时是否绕过代理服务器。The method is used to determine whether to bypass the proxy server when accessing an Internet resource. 和属性控制方法的返回值。 The and properties control the return value of the method. 在`true`以下任何条件下返回: returns `true` under any of the following conditions: - 如果 `host`为`true`且为本地 URI, 则为。If is `true` and `host` is a local URI. 本地请求通过 URI 中缺少句点 (.) 来标识, 如中`http://webserver/`所示。Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in `http://webserver/`. - 如果`host`与中的正则表达式匹配, 则为。If `host` matches a regular expression in . - 如果 为 `null`。If is `null`. 所有其他条件返回`false`。All other conditions return `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个对象并调用此方法来检查是否正确设置了跳过列表。The following code example creates a object and calls this method to check whether the bypass list is properly set. [!code-cpp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CPP/nclwebproxy.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebProxy#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebProxy/CS/nclwebproxy.cs#12)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值控制 是否随请求一起发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether the are sent with requests.

value.span: 如果使用默认凭据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the default credentials are used; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此`true` 对象发出的请求应在服务器请求时使用当前登录用户的凭据进行身份验证, 请将此属性设置为。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序, 这在大多数情况下都是所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序 (如 ASP.NET 应用程序), 通常应将属性设置为代表其发出请求的客户端的凭据。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 下表显示了基于 属性的值设置该值的效果。The following table shows the effect of setting the value, based on the value of the property. | 值 value| 值 value|效果Effect| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| ||`true`|不起作用。No effect.| ||`false`|将 设置为 `null`。 is set to `null`.| |`null`|`true`|将 设置为 。 is set to .| |或以外的任何值`null`Any value other than or `null`|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|设置会引发异常。Setting throws an exception.| 如果为`false` ,则可以将属性更改为任何凭据。If is `false`, you can change the property to any credentials. 如果 为`true`, 则从(属性设置为`true`时设置的值) 更改属性将引发异常。If is `true`, changing the property from (the value that is set when the property is set to `true`) will throw an exception.

exception.span: 当 属性包含默认凭据以外的凭据时，尝试设置此属性。

span.span: You attempted to set this property when the property contains credentials other than the default credentials.
